Question: Primax Electronics Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Primax Electronics Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlights:

- Haptic ForcePad and Waterproof Sealed Keyboard for enhanced user experience
- Control Deck, Webcaster, and 4K AI Camera for content creation and streaming
- Stylish Gaming Headsets with active noise cancellation
- Smart Access Solutions including smart locks, doorbells, and access control
- AI integration in automotive, digital health, home security, photography, video, computing, and consumer electronics
- Advanced camera module technologies for various applications
- Commitment to AI-driven future, embracing and integrating AI into products and services

For more information, visit https://www.primax.com.tw/en/
Summary_cn:
Primax Electronics Ltd.（普雷馬克斯電子有限公司）

CES 2024 產品亮點:

- 認知觸覺薄膜鍵盤（Haptic ForcePad）和防水密封鍵盤，提升使用者體驗
- 適用於內容創作和串流的控制平台（Control Deck）、Webcaster和4K AI攝影機
- 時尚的遊戲耳機，搭載主動式降噪功能
- 智能門禁解決方案，包括智能門鎖、門鈴和出入控制
- 在汽車、數字健康、家庭安全、攝影、影視、計算和消費電子領域中的人工智能整合
- 各種應用的先進相機模組技術
- 著重以人工智能驅動的未來，將人工智能融入產品和服務中

欲了解更多信息，請訪問https://www.primax.com.tw/en/
